description: WARNING: The color of the cylinder in this image is RANDOM and IRRELEVANT. Match ONLY based on spatial position. This slot is strictly BOTTOM-LEFT. CRITICAL DEFINITION: To be bottom_left, the object must satisfy TWO conditions: 1. It is clearly BELOW the central handle (lower half). 2. It is clearly to the LEFT of the central handle. If it is on the horizontal mid_line, it is mid_left, NOT bottom_left.
